name: Pirate Raider
description:
You are the most fearsome pirate in all of the Caribbean. 

Pirate Raider is a short and replayable arcade action game where you try to get the highest infamy score possible by causing havoc all across the Caribbean.

Destroy enemy ships and forts, collect treasure and upgrade your ship to become the greatest threat of the sea.

Instructions

WASD to move

Mouse wheel or up and down arrow keys to control speed.

Left mouse button or left arrow key to fire port.

Right mouse button or right arrow key to fire starboard.

Enjoy!

The web version will remain free, If you would like to support us, consider getting the stand alone version!

Known Issues:

AI pathfinding will sometimes get stuck on land, destroy them to teach them a lesson!
